content.text: Match ends, Newcastle United 2, Leicester City 3.
Second Half ends, Newcastle United 2, Leicester City 3.

Ayoze Pérez (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Isaac Hayden.
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Isaac Hayden.
Substitution, Leicester City. Leonardo Ulloa replaces Jamie Vardy.

Substitution, Leicester City. Christian Fuchs replaces Riyad Mahrez.

Goal!  Newcastle United 2, Leicester City 2. Dwight Gayle (Newcastle United) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Mikel Merino with a headed pass following a corner.
